articles.description: Sequoia, which holds 19.6 percent of BharatPe, did not say if it had insisted on removal of Grover after a third party audit alleged grave governance lapses under him.

articles.title: Govt amends FEMA rules to allow 20% FDI in LIC - Moneycontrol
articles.description: FEMA notification was required to operationalise the provisions DPIIT issued through a press note, including FDI policy changes that will allow large foreign portfolio investors to subscribe to shares of LIC.
articles.content:
